text: those underrated spots are everywhere if you look close enough! found one near some graffiti walls - always thought it was just another city corner till i saw an artist at work there last spring. kinda inspiring tbh 🙂
so true, those little routines make such spots homey!
the little community library box in our area has its charm - free books cycling through constantly & always something interesting popping up!
totally dig these tiny cafes tucked away in alleys - blissful escape during office breaks
for me it's wherever i feel anchored emotionally – work moves can’t change that vibe
home changes when priorities shift – work & love reshape mine
home's less location now more vibe & memories we create
for me it's where personal growth happens - doesn't matter if i'm far from where i started
still waiting for that adult feeling tbh
marketers often get labeled as all talk no substance - total myth! plenty strategic behind-the-scenes brain action going on... we’re just good at making things sound flashy 😉
scroll through insta ads evaluating campaigns..unintentional habit now lol
turning 30 shouldn’t mean crunch time for ticking off society's big life events checklist – we’re not all walking the same path or racing towards identical finish lines here!
